ExamplesÂ¶

Show here some examples

The following python code can be downloaded from [here]

from skeleton.greeters import UberFancyHelloWorld
# let's create an instance
gr=UberFancyHelloWorld(person="Sampsa",age=40)
# print the result
print(gr)

As we can see that code works perfectly
